PHYS 100.name: PHYS 100
PHYS 100.prereqText: Not open to students with credit for PHYS 12. Principles of Mathematics 12 or Pre-calculus 12 is required; Physics 11 is required for first-year students, strongly recommended for others.
PHYS 100.title: Introductory Physics

PHYS 106.name: PHYS 106
PHYS 106.prereqText: Either (a) a score more than 85% in all of PHYS 12, MATH 12 or (b) a score more than 85% in all of PHYS 12, PREC 12 or (c) a score more than 85% in all of PHYS 12, CALC 12 or (d) a score more than 85% in PHYS 100. PHYS 12 = Physics 12; MATH 12 = Principles of Mathematics 12; PREC 12 = Pre-Calculus 12; CALC 12 = Calculus 12.
PHYS 106.title: Enriched Physics 1 (lecture)

PHYS 107.name: PHYS 107
PHYS 107.prereqText: Either (a) a score of 85% or higher in all of PHYS 12, MATH 12 or (b) a score of 85% or higher in all of PHYS 12, PREC 12 or (c) a score of 85% or higher in all of PHYS 12, CALC 12 or (d) a score of 85% or higher in PHYS 100. MATH 12 = Principles of Mathematics 12; PREC 12 = Pre-Calculus 12; CALC 12 = Calculus 12; PHYS 12 = Physics 12.
PHYS 107.title: Enriched Physics 1

PHYS 108.name: PHYS 108
PHYS 108.prereqText: Either (a) one of PHYS 106, PHYS 107 or (b) a score of 85% or higher in one of PHYS 101, PHYS 131 or (c) a score of 85% or higher in PHYS 117.
PHYS 108.title: Enriched Physics II

PHYS 118.name: PHYS 118
PHYS 118.prereqs: PHYS 101 || PHYS 106 || PHYS 107 || PHYS 117 || PHYS 131 || PHYS 157
PHYS 118.prereqText: One of PHYS 101, PHYS 106, PHYS 107, PHYS 117, PHYS 131, PHYS 157 and one of MATH 100, MATH 102, MATH 104, MATH 110, MATH 120, MATH 180, MATH 184.
PHYS 118.title: Electricity, Light and Radiation

PHYS 170.name: PHYS 170
PHYS 170.prereqText: One of PHYS 12, PHYS 100 and one of MATH 100, MATH 102, MATH 104, MATH 110, MATH 120, MATH 180, MATH 184.
PHYS 170.title: Mechanics I

PHYS 200.name: PHYS 200
PHYS 200.prereqText: Either (a) one of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 158, PHYS 153 and one of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121;  or (b) SCIE 001.
PHYS 200.title: Relativity and Quanta

PHYS 203.name: PHYS 203
PHYS 203.prereqText: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 158, PHYS 153, SCIE 001.
PHYS 203.title: Thermal Physics I

PHYS 209.name: PHYS 209
PHYS 209.prereqText: Either (a) all of PHYS 108, PHYS 109 or (b) one of PHYS 102, PHYS 153 or (c) SCIE 001 or (d) all of PHYS 158, PHYS 159 or (e) all of PHYS 118, PHYS 119.
PHYS 209.title: Intermediate Experimental Physics

PHYS 210.name: PHYS 210
PHYS 210.prereqText: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 158, PHYS 153, SCIE 001.
PHYS 210.title: Introduction to Computational Physics

PHYS 216.name: PHYS 216
PHYS 216.prereqText: One of PHYS 107, PHYS 117, PHYS 170, SCIE 001 and one of MATH 152, MATH 221, MATH 223.
PHYS 216.title: Intermediate Mechanics

PHYS 219.name: PHYS 219
PHYS 219.prereqText: Either (a) one of PHYS 108, PHYS 118 and one of PHYS 109, PHYS 119;  or (b) PHYS 102 or (c) all of PHYS 158, PHYS 159 or (d) SCIE 001.
PHYS 219.title: Intermediate Experimental Physics I

PHYS 250.name: PHYS 250
PHYS 250.prereqText: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 158, PHYS 153, SCIE 001.
PHYS 250.title: Introduction to Modern Physics

PHYS 301.name: PHYS 301
PHYS 301.prereqText: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 153, PHYS 158, SCIE 001 and one of MATH 217, MATH 227, MATH 317 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255.
PHYS 301.title: Electricity and Magnetism

PHYS 305.name: PHYS 305
PHYS 305.prereqText: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 153, PHYS 158, SCIE 001 and either (a) PHYS 203 or (b) one of ENPH 257, CHEM 201, CHEM 205 and one of MATH 302, MATH 318, STAT 241, STAT 251, STAT 302.
PHYS 305.title: Introduction to Biophysics

PHYS 306.name: PHYS 306
PHYS 306.prereqText: One of PHYS 216, ENPH 270 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255, MATH 256, MATH 258.
PHYS 306.title: Advanced Mechanics

PHYS 333.name: PHYS 333
PHYS 333.prereqs: PHYS 101 || PHYS 102 || PHYS 107 || PHYS 108 || PHYS 117 || PHYS 118 || PHYS 153 || PHYS 157 || PHYS 158
PHYS 333.prereqText: Either (a) one of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121 and one of PHYS 101, PHYS 102, PHYS 107, PHYS 108, PHYS 117, PHYS 118, PHYS 153, PHYS 157, PHYS 158;  or (b) SCIE 001.
PHYS 333.title: Energy and Climate

PHYS 348.name: PHYS 348
PHYS 348.prereqText: Third-year standing in a physics honours program or fourth-year standing in a physics or astronomy major program.
PHYS 348.title: Frontiers in Physics and Astronomy

PHYS 354.name: PHYS 354
PHYS 354.prereqText: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 153, SCIE 001 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255 and one of MATH 217, MATH 227, MATH 317.
PHYS 354.title: Electric and Magnetic Fields

PHYS 403.name: PHYS 403
PHYS 403.prereqText: One of PHYS 203, ENPH 257, CHEM 201, CHEM 304 and one of PHYS 304, PHYS 450, CHEM 312. One of MATH 302, MATH 318, STAT 241, STAT 251, STAT 302 is recommended.
PHYS 403.title: Statistical Mechanics

PHYS 404.name: PHYS 404
PHYS 404.prereqText: Third year standing in Science or Applied Science is required. MATH 200 (or MATH 217 or MATH 226) is recommended.
PHYS 404.title: Introduction to Medical Physics

PHYS 405.name: PHYS 405
PHYS 405.prereqText: One of PHYS 102, PHYS 108, PHYS 118, PHYS 153, PHYS 158, SCIE 001 and third year standing in Science or Applied Science.
PHYS 405.title: Radiation Biophysics

PHYS 407.name: PHYS 407
PHYS 407.prereqText: One of MATH 217, MATH 227, MATH 317 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255. PHYS 301 and PHYS 306 are recommended.
PHYS 407.title: Introduction to General Relativity

PHYS 408.name: PHYS 408
PHYS 408.prereqText: One of PHYS 301, PHYS 354 and one of MATH 215, MATH 255.
PHYS 408.title: Optics

PHYS 410.name: PHYS 410
PHYS 410.prereqText: One of PHYS 312, MATH 257, MATH 316 and one of PHYS 210, EOSC 211, CPSC 110, CPSC 103, APSC 160.
PHYS 410.title: Computational Physics

PHYS 438.name: PHYS 438
PHYS 438.prereqs: PHYS 101 || PHYS 106 || PHYS 107 || PHYS 117 || PHYS 131 || PHYS 157
PHYS 438.prereqText: One of PHYS 101, PHYS 106, PHYS 107, PHYS 117, PHYS 131, PHYS 157, SCIE 001. BIOL 325 is recommended.
PHYS 438.title: Zoological Physics
